attributes.review: I LOVEEEE trump so much he’s the best president we’ve ever had and he should be around forever and ever so duh i wanted to get the app so i can check in on his amazing daily breefings and such so IMAGINE my dismay when it took 69 days to download this app. so i was like whatever it’s fine. now  I’ve been waiting for my app for soooo long i couldn’t bear to wait any longer so i opened it up real quick. but it wouldn’t let me open the app! the radical leftist democrat’s have taken over trumps app and are trying to stop me from entering the app! i can’t believe this none sense. when i finally got the app open the first thing i saw was a post about BLM. the heck is BLM. nasty. those radicals have even hacked into the app and posted about some dumb BLM thing. what even is this?!?!?!?! i want to hear about children in cages and working with russia that’s the good stuff that’s some of trumps best stuff but instead BLMMMMM WHAAAAAT. i hate this app. it’s even trying to make black lives matter. who do they think they are those radical dem hackers!!!! i’m fuuuuurious.

attributes.review: The app took forever to download and was super slow. I was hoping to see updated information on what  new idiotic thing trump did but instead I got some stupid stuff on how trump is handling this world situation well. Also I hated that I had to put in personal info news apps are supposed to give you news not know your personal information. After one or two days I developed a virus on my phone and it originated in the this app. It is a horrendous app. If also accessed all the personal information on my phone and I counts control what my phone was doing. At one point the screen wouldn’t respond at all and my phone wouldn’t charge. Also whenever I texted anyone it would say Trump 2020 my friends thought that I went crazy because they know I would never say that. Also this app uses the American flag just like the rest of trumps stuff using the American flag on t-shirts, hats, bumbler stickers, ect. which is illegal.
